item.title: Detroit startup Grounded has a Lego-like way of designing EV vans for small businesses
item.description:
When Also Capital managing partner Mike Annunziata walks around New York City these days, he sees lots of vans — and opportunity. It’s something he admits he never noticed until he met former SpaceX engineer Sam Shapiro, who is the founder of a new Detroit-based modular electric RV startup called Grounded. Sometimes, Annunziata told TechCrunch, […]

item.title: Rivian shares fall after EV maker slashes production forecast, misses Q3 delivery expectations
item.description: Rivian produced 13,157 vehicles at its manufacturing facility in Normal, Illinois, and delivered 10,018 vehicles during the same period.

item.title: Owners of certain Chevrolet, GMC trucks can claim money in $35 million settlement
I drove Toyota's $55,000 Highlander Hybrid. Its noisy engine and tepid performance were disappointing.
